thread.title: ViON Names Ed Stockton Vice President of Services

author: cnbc.com
title: ViON Names Ed Stockton Vice President of Services
text:
HERNDON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- ViON Corporation , a cloud service provider and market leader in the design, delivery and maintenance of mission-critical IT infrastructure solutions, announced today the appointment of Ed Stockton as the new Vice President of Services. Mr. Stockton brings over 17 years of experience leading IT services teams, supporting large-scale projects for commercial and Federal Government customers.
“Our portfolio of services is and always has been a key asset to our customers as they seek the best path to modernization,” said Tom Frana, Chairman and CEO of ViON. “Ed’s industry experience and understanding of the demands our customers face in the field will allow us to strengthen our customer intimacy model and facilitate a more seamless transition to new data center technologies for all our customers at a time when they need it most.”
As Vice President of Services, Mr. Stockton will help drive sales and manage delivery of ViON services, which includes: field engineering, onsite break/fix support, spares support, engineering changes, preventative and concurrent maintenance and access to ViON’s 24/7/365 secure support center. Prior to becoming Vice President of Services, Mr. Stockton served as ViON’s Business Development Director for Federal Civilian Agencies. He built long-term relationships with partners and customers and leveraged ViON’s Cloud, Big Data and Security solutions. Before joining ViON, he spent more than five years at CA Technologies as Director of Services Delivery, where he was responsible for directing 22 projects valued at $15 million annually.
“I appreciate the level of commitment and pride ViON takes in helping its customers solve not just technology challenges, but the struggles of migration and daily management that can hinder any operation,” said Stockton. “I look forward to developing relationships with agencies and partners to bring the next generation data center within reach for all our customers.”
About ViON Corporation
ViON Corporation is a cloud service provider with over 37 years experience designing and delivering enterprise data center solutions to government agencies and commercial businesses. The company provides IT as-a-Service solutions including on-premise public cloud capabilities to simplify the challenges facing business leaders and agency executives. Focused on supporting the customer’s evolution to the next generation data center, ViON’s Data Center as-a-Service offering provides innovative solutions from OEMs and disruptive technology providers via a consumption-based model. ViON delivers expertise and an outstanding customer experience at every step with professional and managed services, backed by highly-trained, cleared resources. A veteran-owned company based in Herndon, Virginia, the company has field offices throughout the U.S. ( www.vion.com ).
